TestCase.name: testJoinHintsWithDuplicatedArgs
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1, T1) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintsWithMultiSameJoinHintsAndMultiArgs
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1, T2), SHUFFLE_HASH(T2, T1) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintsWithMultiSameJoinHintsAndSingleArg
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1), SHUFFLE_HASH(T2) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithAntiJoinAndLeftSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1 where a1 not in (select a2 from T2)

NestedLoopJoin(joinType=[LeftAntiJoin], where=[OR(IS NULL(a1), IS NULL(a2), =(a1, a2))], select=[a1, b1], build=[right]) :- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, project=[a2], metadata=[]]], fields=[a2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithAntiJoinAndRightSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T2) */* from T1 where a1 not in (select a2 from T2)

NestedLoopJoin(joinType=[LeftAntiJoin], where=[OR(IS NULL(a1), IS NULL(a2), =(a1, a2))], select=[a1, b1], build=[right]) :- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, project=[a2], metadata=[]]], fields=[a2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1 inner join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2 and T1.a1 < 1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), <($0, 1))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, b1], where=[<(a1, 1)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, filter=[]]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1 inner join T2 on T1.b1 = T2.b2 and T1.a1 < 1 and T1.a1 < T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $3), <($0, 1), <($0, $2))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(b1, b2), <(a1, a2))], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, b1], where=[<(a1, 1)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, filter=[]]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1, T2 where T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $2)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithEquiPredAndFilter
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1, T2 where T1.a1 = T2.a2 and T1.a1 > 1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), >($0, 1))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, b1], where=[>(a1, 1)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, filter=[]]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T2) */* from T1 full join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithMultiJoinAndFirstSideAsBuildSide1
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1, T2) */* from T1, T2, T3 where T1.a1 = T2.a2 and T1.b1 = T3.b3

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3], a3=[$4], b3=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $5))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(b1, b3)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2, a3, b3], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]]) : +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) : :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b3]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]], fields=[a3, b3])

TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1 inner join T2 on T1.a1 > T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[>($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithoutAffectingJoinInSubQuery
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1)*/T1.* from T1 join (select T1.* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2) V2 on T1.a1 = V2.a1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a10)], select=[a1, b1, a10], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Calc(select=[a1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, a2], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, project=[a1], metadata=[]]], fields=[a1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, project=[a2], metadata=[]]], fields=[a2])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithRightJoinAndRightSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T2) */* from T1 right join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithSemiJoinAndLeftSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1 where a1 in (select a2 from T2)

HashJoin(joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, project=[a2], metadata=[]]], fields=[a2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithSemiJoinAndRightSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T2) */* from T1 where a1 in (select a2 from T2)

HashJoin(joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, project=[a2], metadata=[]]], fields=[a2])

TestCase.name: testMultiJoinHints
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1), BROADCAST(T1),SHUFFLE_MERGE(T1),NEST_LOOP(T1) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithTableAlias
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(V2)*/T1.* from T1 join (select T1.* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2) V2 on T1.a1 = V2.a1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a10)], select=[a1, b1, a10], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Calc(select=[a1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, a2], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, project=[a1], metadata=[]]], fields=[a1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, project=[a2], metadata=[]]], fields=[a2])

TestCase.name: testJoinHintWithView
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(V4) */* from T1 join V4 on T1.a1 = V4.a4

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a4=[$2], b4=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(a4=[$0], b4=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a3)], select=[a1, b1, a3, b3], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a3]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]], fields=[a3, b3])

TestCase.name: testMultiJoinHintsWithTheFirstOneIsInvalid
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1), NEST_LOOP(T1) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 > T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[>($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

NestedLoopJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[>(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testSimpleJoinHintWithLeftSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T1) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testSimpleJoinHintWithRightSideAsBuildSide
TestCase.Resource: select /*+ SHUFFLE_HASH(T2) */* from T1 join T2 on T1.a1 = T2.a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, a2)], select=[a1, b1, a2, b2], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]], fields=[a1, b1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]], fields=[a2, b2])
